releases.title: AppCenter 7.3.0 Released!
releases.body:
## What's Changed
* Create AuthorView by @danirabbit in https://github.com/elementary/appcenter/pull/1997
* Switch to GHCR containers by @davidmhewitt in https://github.com/elementary/appcenter/pull/2014
* Show Flatpak permissions by @danirabbit in https://github.com/elementary/appcenter/pull/2007
* Fix deprecations for AppStream 0.16 by @meisenzahl in https://github.com/elementary/appcenter/pull/2015
* Require newer meson and fix deprecations by @lenemter in https://github.com/elementary/appcenter/pull/2034
* AppInfoView: rework vertical spacing by @danirabbit in https://github.com/elementary/appcenter/pull/2024
* Homepage placeholder by @danirabbit in https://github.com/elementary/appcenter/pull/2030
* CategoryView: Sort native apps first instead of splitting by @danirabbit in https://github.com/elementary/appcenter/pull/2029
* Add meson options to disable backends by @meisenzahl in https://github.com/elementary/appcenter/pull/1994
* AppInfoView: warn about home permissions by @danirabbit in https://github.com/elementary/appcenter/pull/2040
* AppInfoView: warn about direct geoclue access by @danirabbit in https://github.com/elementary/appcenter/pull/2041
* Homepage: misc banner and carousel cleanup by @danirabbit in https://github.com/elementary/appcenter/pull/2042
* AppInfoView: warn about sandbox escape by @danirabbit in https://github.com/elementary/appcenter/pull/2039
* AppInfoView: warn about settings access by @danirabbit in https://github.com/elementary/appcenter/pull/2043
* FlatpakBackend: Add null checks for user and system installation by @meisenzahl in https://github.com/elementary/appcenter/pull/2053

## New Contributors
* @lenemter made their first contribution in https://github.com/elementary/appcenter/pull/2034

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/elementary/appcenter/compare/7.2.1...7.3.0

releases.title: AppCenter 7.0.0 Released
releases.body:
## What's Changed
* PackageKitBackend: resolve addons in appstream pool by @danirabbit in https://github.com/elementary/appcenter/pull/1946
* Gresource: add more category icons by @danirabbit in https://github.com/elementary/appcenter/pull/1948
* Fix visual issues with category icons by @danirabbit in https://github.com/elementary/appcenter/pull/1954
* Flatpak Runtimes by @meisenzahl in https://github.com/elementary/appcenter/pull/1956
* Size information for Runtime Updates by @meisenzahl in https://github.com/elementary/appcenter/pull/1957
* Install PackageKit based Operating System Updates as Offline Updates by @meisenzahl in https://github.com/elementary/appcenter/pull/1943
* Pretty output Flatpak package origins by @meisenzahl in https://github.com/elementary/appcenter/pull/1962
* Warn running in Demo Mode by @meisenzahl in https://github.com/elementary/appcenter/pull/1963
* Show Operating System Updates and Runtime Updates only if available by @meisenzahl in https://github.com/elementary/appcenter/pull/1960
* Make loading updates async from main AppCenter window by @meisenzahl in https://github.com/elementary/appcenter/pull/1964
* Gettext: install git by @danirabbit in https://github.com/elementary/appcenter/pull/1968
* Gresource: mark OARS icons as scalable, scale all to 32px by @danirabbit in https://github.com/elementary/appcenter/pull/1970
* Metainfo Improvements by @danirabbit in https://github.com/elementary/appcenter/pull/1972
* Fix crash activating category while checking for updates by @vjr in https://github.com/elementary/appcenter/pull/1973

## New Contributors
* @vjr made their first contribution in https://github.com/elementary/appcenter/pull/1973

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/elementary/appcenter/compare/4.0.0...7.0.0

releases.title: appcenter 4.0.0 Released
releases.body:
New features:

  • Rewritten navigation with multitouch gestures to go back
  • Recently updated apps are shown at the top of category views
  • A status overlay bar is now shown when tasks are in progress

App Info Page Improvements:

  • Screenshot carousels fill the width of the window, showing more screenshots at once
  • An app's accent color is now shown behind screenshots
  • Get brand colors from the AppStream standard so more apps are supported
  • Wrap links at the bottom pages instead of ellipsize
  • Better dark style support

Updates View Improvements:

  • Release notes are shown in a dialog
  • Better fallback icons for components
  • The "Update All" header now sticks to the top of the window when scrolling

Other Improvements:

  • Redesigned "Fun & Games" category card
  • Performance improvements
  • Stability improvements
  • Updated translations

New features

releases.title: appcenter 3.3.0 Released
releases.body:
Performance improvements

  • Only check for updates at device startup if it's more than 24 hours since we last checked
  • Reduce slowdowns when opening certain apps

Extension improvements

  • To de-clutter the updates view, extensions are now only shown if they require updates
  • Clicking an extension on an app's info page now shows details for the extension
  • Swap the main and overlay icons for extensions to more clearly associate extensions with their app

Keyboard improvements

  • Pressing down in the search field moves the keyboard focus to the search results list
  • Ctrl+F now moves the cursor to the search field

Fixes

  • Use configured network proxy settings for apt operations
  • No longer prompt for approval to update non-curated apps
  • Ensure the OS updates subheading copy is correct after finishing updates
  • Ellipsize long app names in App Info views

And more

  • Show a more informative loading screen when checking for updates
  • Don't list fonts alongside apps
  • Updated translations

releases.title: appcenter 3.2.4 Released
releases.body:
Fixes

  • Prevent crashes when updating Flatpaks and system packages simultaneously
  • Prevent suspending when installing, updating, or removing packages
  • Updated translations

releases.title: appcenter 3.2.2 Released
releases.body:
appcenter 3.2.2 is out!

Minor fixes

  • Update application details when changes happen outside of AppCenter
  • Fix for notification not appearing when a restart is required
  • Apps in list views now load in the correct order when scrolling
  • Prevent unescaped XML entities from appearing in application names
  • Load the "Installed" view faster
  • Ensure flatpak applications show in the category views
  • Save some bandwidth by downloading smaller screenshots where appropriate
  • System components no longer have an "Open" button
  • Applications menu can now remove flatpaks that weren't installed by AppCenter
  • Make download size estimates more accurate

appcenter 3.2.0 is out! 

Changes:

* Add support for Flatpak apps
* Warn about non-curated apps
* Show an error dialog if an installation fails
* Fix an issue where some apps couldn't be uninstalled from the Applications Menu
* Allow browsing and uninstalling apps while offline
* Fix twitter share URLs
* Drop Google+ from the share menu
* Animate screenshot background while loading
* Add navigation arrows for screenshots
* Don't show uninstall buttons for essential system components
* Properly display proprietary licenses
* Fix some layout issues
* Fix crashes
* Performance improvements
* Updated translations

releases.title: Settings Daemon 8.0.0 Released!
releases.body:
## What's Changed
* Port `SettingsDaemon.Application` to `Gtk.Application` by @Marukesu in https://github.com/elementary/settings-daemon/pull/81
* Correct gettext domain by @Marukesu in https://github.com/elementary/settings-daemon/pull/80
* Implement system updates by @leolost2605 in https://github.com/elementary/settings-daemon/pull/88
* SystemUpdate: withdraw old notifications on startup by @danirabbit in https://github.com/elementary/settings-daemon/pull/119
* Redesign icon by @danirabbit in https://github.com/elementary/settings-daemon/pull/122
* Fix small readme typo by @leolost2605 in https://github.com/elementary/settings-daemon/pull/129
* Add AccentColor Backend by @Marukesu in https://github.com/elementary/settings-daemon/pull/128
* SystemUpdate: include security info in dbus by @danirabbit in https://github.com/elementary/settings-daemon/pull/120

releases.title: terminal 6.3.0 Released
releases.body:
## What's Changed
* Replace Granite.DynamicNotebook with Hdy TabView and TabBar by @jeremypw in https://github.com/elementary/terminal/pull/760
* TerminalView: ReLoad‚ÜíReload by @ryonakano in https://github.com/elementary/terminal/pull/767
* Fix empty context menu regression by @jeremypw in https://github.com/elementary/terminal/pull/768
* Use GLib.MenuModel for context menu by @jeremypw in https://github.com/elementary/terminal/pull/769
* Don't set icon size for button from icon name by @danirabbit in https://github.com/elementary/terminal/pull/771
* fix(Themes): increase contrast for gray, fixes #682 by @cshaa in https://github.com/elementary/terminal/pull/755
* Show zoom level in centre or terminal when changing. by @jeremypw in https://github.com/elementary/terminal/pull/772
* upd(TerminalWidget): add doas checking by @Elsie19 in https://github.com/elementary/terminal/pull/774
* Update POTFILES by @ryonakano in https://github.com/elementary/terminal/pull/779
* Focus current tab by @igordsm in https://github.com/elementary/terminal/pull/638
* Gtk4Prep - Lose geometry hints by @jeremypw in https://github.com/elementary/terminal/pull/782
* Gtk4Prep - Do not subclass Gtk.Label by @jeremypw in https://github.com/elementary/terminal/pull/784
* Gtk4Prep - Handle restoring and syncing window state in Application by @jeremypw in https://github.com/elementary/terminal/pull/783
* SettingsPopover: use provider_for_screen for theme buttons by @danirabbit in https://github.com/elementary/terminal/pull/785
* Separate button controllers - Gtk4 prep by @jeremypw in https://github.com/elementary/terminal/pull/787
* Gtk4 Prep - SettingsPopover - call terminal zoom functions directly by @jeremypw in https://github.com/elementary/terminal/pull/789
* Code Style -  by @jeremypw in https://github.com/elementary/terminal/pull/790
* Implement Clear and Reset actions with hotkeys by @jeremypw in https://github.com/elementary/terminal/pull/778
* Update cyclic search button when toggled by @jeremypw in https://github.com/elementary/terminal/pull/795
* Add toggle for unsafe paste by @teamcons in https://github.com/elementary/terminal/pull/798
* Correctly open uris containing spaces by @jeremypw in https://github.com/elementary/terminal/pull/777
* Check for unsafe  drop  by @jeremypw in https://github.com/elementary/terminal/pull/794
* TerminalWidget: Fix non administrative commands not being pasted by @ryonakano in https://github.com/elementary/terminal/pull/802
* Drop dead feature that disables unsafe paste warning while Terminal opens by @ryonakano in https://github.com/elementary/terminal/pull/803
* TerminalWidget: Refactor validated_feed to avoid nested conditions by @ryonakano in https://github.com/elementary/terminal/pull/804
* Provide fallback directory for active shell under test by @jeremypw in https://github.com/elementary/terminal/pull/810
* Application: withdraw stale notifications by @danirabbit in https://github.com/elementary/terminal/pull/813
* Enhance unsafe detection by @teamcons in https://github.com/elementary/terminal/pull/800
* Add tab to new window created with <Shift><Ctrl>N by @jeremypw in https://github.com/elementary/terminal/pull/816

## New Contributors
* @cshaa made their first contribution in https://github.com/elementary/terminal/pull/755
* @Elsie19 made their first contribution in https://github.com/elementary/terminal/pull/774
* @teamcons made their first contribution in https://github.com/elementary/terminal/pull/798

releases.title: gala 8.0.0 Released
releases.body:
## What's Changed
* IconGroup: remove close button by @lenemter in https://github.com/elementary/gala/pull/1794
* Remove  `workspace-switcher-background` key by @lenemter in https://github.com/elementary/gala/pull/1798
* Remove `expose-windows` shortcut by @lenemter in https://github.com/elementary/gala/pull/1795
* Remember window position by @lenemter in https://github.com/elementary/gala/pull/1751
* Add "Switch windows" gesture by @lenemter in https://github.com/elementary/gala/pull/1802
* Animate nudge with clones by @lenemter in https://github.com/elementary/gala/pull/1803
* Improve debug messages in notifications stack and add more checks by @lenemter in https://github.com/elementary/gala/pull/1805
* BackgroundManager: Inline namespace by @lenemter in https://github.com/elementary/gala/pull/1808
* BackgroundManager: Don't position background actors by @lenemter in https://github.com/elementary/gala/pull/1809
* Round corners of workspaces in multitasking view by @lenemter in https://github.com/elementary/gala/pull/1734
* Revert "BackgroundManager: Don't position background actors" by @lenemter in https://github.com/elementary/gala/pull/1814
* Show notifications on the left in RTL languages by @lenemter in https://github.com/elementary/gala/pull/1812
* Add an option to disable hotcorners in fullscreen by @lenemter in https://github.com/elementary/gala/pull/1806
* Add support for Mutter 46 by @tintou in https://github.com/elementary/gala/pull/1825
* Remove content.set_rounded_clip_bounds by @leolost2605 in https://github.com/elementary/gala/pull/1819
* Use event time instead of META_CURRENT_TIME by @lenemter in https://github.com/elementary/gala/pull/1828
* switch_to_next_workspace: require timestamp by @lenemter in https://github.com/elementary/gala/pull/1830
* move_window: require timestamp by @lenemter in https://github.com/elementary/gala/pull/1831
* Add window spread for an app by @leolost2605 in https://github.com/elementary/gala/pull/1833
* WindowSwitcher: Fix accent color by @leolost2605 in https://github.com/elementary/gala/pull/1835
* Move AccentColorManager to settings-daemon by @lenemter in https://github.com/elementary/gala/pull/1842
* WindowSwitcher: Improve mouse handling by @leolost2605 in https://github.com/elementary/gala/pull/1836
* MultitaskingView: Add blurred wallpaper by @lenemter in https://github.com/elementary/gala/pull/1810
* Fix rounded background by @leolost2605 in https://github.com/elementary/gala/pull/1845
* Fix no rounded corners on first start by @leolost2605 in https://github.com/elementary/gala/pull/1847
* MultitaskingView: move keyboard navigation code into WindowCloneContainer by @lenemter in https://github.com/elementary/gala/pull/1793
* Remove corner mask in favor of rounded background corners by @leolost2605 in https://github.com/elementary/gala/pull/1846
* Rework close button by @lenemter in https://github.com/elementary/gala/pull/1848
* Fix documentation by @leolost2605 in https://github.com/elementary/gala/pull/1854
* WindowCloneContainer: When no window is active, select active window based on direction during keyboard nav by @leolost2605 in https://github.com/elementary/gala/pull/1849
* SystemBackground: cleanup by @lenemter in https://github.com/elementary/gala/pull/1851
* PixelPicker: Remove unused canvas by @leolost2605 in https://github.com/elementary/gala/pull/1858
* Wayland menus by @leolost2605 in https://github.com/elementary/gala/pull/1844
* Daemon: Implement monitor labels by @leolost2605 in https://github.com/elementary/gala/pull/1861
* Expose BackgroundManager to the library by @lenemter in https://github.com/elementary/gala/pull/1859
* MonitorLabel: clean up styles, gtk4 prep by @danirabbit in https://github.com/elementary/gala/pull/1862
* Introduce a CanvasActor by @leolost2605 in https://github.com/elementary/gala/pull/1864
* Tooltip: Dont use Gtk StyleContext by @leolost2605 in https://github.com/elementary/gala/pull/1865
* WindowClone/ActiveShape: Don't use Gtk.StyleContext by @leolost2605 in https://github.com/elementary/gala/pull/1866
* WindowSwitcher: Don't use Gtk by @leolost2605 in https://github.com/elementary/gala/pull/1868
* Fix dim effect removal on wayland by @leolost2605 in https://github.com/elementary/gala/pull/1873
* Improve window dragging between workspaces by @lenemter in https://github.com/elementary/gala/pull/1874
* Update Mutter 46 support by @tintou in https://github.com/elementary/gala/pull/1856
* Allow focusing a window via DesktopIntegration by @leolost2605 in https://github.com/elementary/gala/pull/1817
* Add Gala.Barrier by @leolost2605 in https://github.com/elementary/gala/pull/1855
* Set `Super + Space` to switch keyboard layout by default by @lenemter in https://github.com/elementary/gala/pull/1878
* WindowSwitcher: Remove Gtk.Settings by @leolost2605 in https://github.com/elementary/gala/pull/1881
* Introduce a StyleManager by @leolost2605 in https://github.com/elementary/gala/pull/1880
* wayland: Launch notifications server as a wayland client by @leolost2605 in https://github.com/elementary/gala/pull/1882
* CI: Remove plank dep by @leolost2605 in https://github.com/elementary/gala/pull/1885
* Remove libcanberra-gtk remnants by @leolost2605 in https://github.com/elementary/gala/pull/1886
* wayland: Fix drag and drop icons by @leolost2605 in https://github.com/elementary/gala/pull/1889
* WindowSwitcher: Fix blocking input by @leolost2605 in https://github.com/elementary/gala/pull/1883
* WindowSwitcher: Fix mouse click by @leolost2605 in https://github.com/elementary/gala/pull/1891
* Barrier: fix build with mutter 46 by @danirabbit in https://github.com/elementary/gala/pull/1895
* WindowManager: Keep docks static during workspace switch by @leolost2605 in https://github.com/elementary/gala/pull/1894
* Fix move-to-workspace-last shortcut by @lenemter in https://github.com/elementary/gala/pull/1896
* Play sound when cycle-workspaces shortcut fails by @lenemter in https://github.com/elementary/gala/pull/1899
* WorkspaceManager: Make cleanup private by @tintou in https://github.com/elementary/gala/pull/1901
* wayland: Implement shell by @leolost2605 in https://github.com/elementary/gala/pull/1906
* BackgroundManager: Don't set visible by @leolost2605 in https://github.com/elementary/gala/pull/1910
* ShellClients: Don't keep a clone if we never hide by @leolost2605 in https://github.com/elementary/gala/pull/1907
* Fix barriers by @leolost2605 in https://github.com/elementary/gala/pull/1908
* InternalUtils: Fix window placement by @leolost2605 in https://github.com/elementary/gala/pull/1913
* WindowSwitcher: draw our own borders by @danirabbit in https://github.com/elementary/gala/pull/1918
* MultitaskingView: Fix dock animation by @leolost2605 in https://github.com/elementary/gala/pull/1912
* ShadowEffect: Dont use Gtk to draw shadows by @leolost2605 in https://github.com/elementary/gala/pull/1867
* Fix notification focus by @leolost2605 in https://github.com/elementary/gala/pull/1926
* ShellClients: Keep clone only destroy HideTracker  by @leolost2605 in https://github.com/elementary/gala/pull/1915
* PantheonShell: Add more warnings by @leolost2605 in https://github.com/elementary/gala/pull/1929
* Avoid ending our own process by @leolost2605 in https://github.com/elementary/gala/pull/1919
* PanelClone: Animate in by @leolost2605 in https://github.com/elementary/gala/pull/1930
* PanelClone: Don't animate while in fullscreen by @leolost2605 in https://github.com/elementary/gala/pull/1927
* Remove GSD dependency by @lenemter in https://github.com/elementary/gala/pull/1931
* PanelWindow: Reposition windows on monitor change by @leolost2605 in https://github.com/elementary/gala/pull/1909
* Fix icons by @leolost2605 in https://github.com/elementary/gala/pull/1936
* DesktopIntegration: Switch to correct workspace when focusing window by @leolost2605 in https://github.com/elementary/gala/pull/1939
* PanelWindow: Make struts more reliable by @leolost2605 in https://github.com/elementary/gala/pull/1935
* Dialogs: Fix Mutter bindings around dialog creation by @tintou in https://github.com/elementary/gala/pull/1941
* CloseDialog: Reuse the Gala.App object to get the user-visible title by @tintou in https://github.com/elementary/gala/pull/1944
* Dialogs: Implement InhibitShortcutsDialog by @leolost2605 in https://github.com/elementary/gala/pull/1948
* DragDropAction: Fix memory leak by @leolost2605 in https://github.com/elementary/gala/pull/1950
* Canvas: discard bitmap on invalidate by @lenemter in https://github.com/elementary/gala/pull/1952
* Manually set ui_group size by @lenemter in https://github.com/elementary/gala/pull/1953
* Fix indentation by @leolost2605 in https://github.com/elementary/gala/pull/1955
* ShadowEffect: Avoid painting inside the actor by @lenemter in https://github.com/elementary/gala/pull/1954
* Dialogs: Use the provided object in finish by @tintou in https://github.com/elementary/gala/pull/1958
* wayland/NotificationStack: Don't flicker at the beginning of the animation by @leolost2605 in https://github.com/elementary/gala/pull/1963
* Shell: Move trusted clients config to own config file by @leolost2605 in https://github.com/elementary/gala/pull/1956
* PanelWindow: Fix possible segfault by @leolost2605 in https://github.com/elementary/gala/pull/1966
* Daemon: Port to GTK4 by @leolost2605 in https://github.com/elementary/gala/pull/1964
* ScreenshotManager: Use get_image from actor directly by @tintou in https://github.com/elementary/gala/pull/1957
* DragDropAction: support touch by @lenemter in https://github.com/elementary/gala/pull/1962
* Fix function documentation by @lenemter in https://github.com/elementary/gala/pull/1970
* WindowSwitcher: Fix memory leak by @lenemter in https://github.com/elementary/gala/pull/1972
* WindowManager: Remove unneeded return by @lenemter in https://github.com/elementary/gala/pull/1971
* Animation: Fix code style by @lenemter in https://github.com/elementary/gala/pull/1969
* BackgroundManager: Send changed signal early by @lenemter in https://github.com/elementary/gala/pull/1968
* DesktopIntegration: Report wether the window is in the current active workspace by @tintou in https://github.com/elementary/gala/pull/1977
* DragDropAction: Release hovered reference when finishing the action by @tintou in https://github.com/elementary/gala/pull/1979
* WindowCloneContainer: Release selected window's reference when on `destroy` by @lenemter in https://github.com/elementary/gala/pull/1980
* WindowClone: Fix memory leak in window spread by @lenemter in https://github.com/elementary/gala/pull/1981
* wayland: Implement make_center by @leolost2605 in https://github.com/elementary/gala/pull/1942
* meson: Use gnome module to compile schemas by @ryonakano in https://github.com/elementary/gala/pull/1987
* Fix several C warnings by @tintou in https://github.com/elementary/gala/pull/1989
* Shell Config: add polkit agent by @danirabbit in https://github.com/elementary/gala/pull/1983
* GSchema: remove deprecated keys by @lenemter in https://github.com/elementary/gala/pull/2000
* DBus: cleanup by @lenemter in https://github.com/elementary/gala/pull/2001
* PiP: Fix shadow by @lenemter in https://github.com/elementary/gala/pull/2005
* ShellClients: Allow X11 clients to use pantheon protocol via mutter hints by @leolost2605 in https://github.com/elementary/gala/pull/2002
* Launch dock on X by @lenemter in https://github.com/elementary/gala/pull/2008
* ShellClients: Don't make centered clients docks but allow their shortcut inhibition without dialog by @leolost2605 in https://github.com/elementary/gala/pull/1995
* DesktopIntegration/focus_window: Shake window and bell if already focused  by @leolost2605 in https://github.com/elementary/gala/pull/2006
* Sort windows by stacking order before workspace switch by @lenemter in https://github.com/elementary/gala/pull/2013
* ScreenshotManager: Fix saving to clipboard by @lenemter in https://github.com/elementary/gala/pull/2017
* Remove blurry rounded corners by @lenemter in https://github.com/elementary/gala/pull/2018
* DesktopIntegration: Don't send positioned windows by @leolost2605 in https://github.com/elementary/gala/pull/2020
* Remove leftovers from gala.css by @lenemter in https://github.com/elementary/gala/pull/2021
* Zoom: avoid using `Gdk.beep` by @lenemter in https://github.com/elementary/gala/pull/2022
* Fix move/resize actions by @leolost2605 in https://github.com/elementary/gala/pull/2019
* ShellClients: Fix crash when positioning window while unmanaging by @leolost2605 in https://github.com/elementary/gala/pull/2027
* ShellClients: Fix memory leak and crash by @leolost2605 in https://github.com/elementary/gala/pull/2028
* RDNN keybindings gsettings schema by @lenemter in https://github.com/elementary/gala/pull/2032
* RDNN animations schema by @lenemter in https://github.com/elementary/gala/pull/2033
* RDNN behavior schema by @lenemter in https://github.com/elementary/gala/pull/2034

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/elementary/gala/compare/7.1.3...8.0.0

releases.title: gala 7.1.3 Released
releases.body:
Improvements:

  • Changing the wallpaper or going to sleep respects the "Reduce Motion" option
  • Use appropriate drag-and-drop pointers when moving windows
  • Fix the issue when gestures in the multitasking view might stop working
  • Improve dynamic workspaces behaviour with multiple monitors
  • Updated translations

releases.title: Gala 7.0.3 Released!
releases.body:
## What's Changed
* WM: Add laters via compositor by @davidmhewitt in https://github.com/elementary/gala/pull/1619
* maskcorners: Scale corner masks per-monitor by @davidmhewitt in https://github.com/elementary/gala/pull/1620
* Utils: Remove bell by @davidmhewitt in https://github.com/elementary/gala/pull/1621
* Enable `Alt + ~` to switch between windows of the same application by @lenemter in https://github.com/elementary/gala/pull/1602
* DwellClickTimer: Support non-integer, monitor specific scales by @davidmhewitt in https://github.com/elementary/gala/pull/1618
* ScreenshotManager: Support non-integer scaling factors by @davidmhewitt in https://github.com/elementary/gala/pull/1623
* WM: Init things that depend on GTK later by @davidmhewitt in https://github.com/elementary/gala/pull/1622
* KeyboardManager: Set keyboard layout on startup by @lenemter in https://github.com/elementary/gala/pull/1626
* HotCorners: Support floating point scale factors by @davidmhewitt in https://github.com/elementary/gala/pull/1627
* WM: Drop Meta.ShadowFactory by @lenemter in https://github.com/elementary/gala/pull/1625
* IconGroup: Support floating scale factors by @davidmhewitt in https://github.com/elementary/gala/pull/1628
* WorkspaceInsertThumb: Support floating point scale factors by @davidmhewitt in https://github.com/elementary/gala/pull/1629
* Support floating point scale for resize button by @davidmhewitt in https://github.com/elementary/gala/pull/1630
* NotificationStack: Support floating point scale factors by @davidmhewitt in https://github.com/elementary/gala/pull/1631
* WindowSwitcher: Support floating point scale factors by @davidmhewitt in https://github.com/elementary/gala/pull/1632
* InternalUtils: Remove pixel_align method, and just round by @davidmhewitt in https://github.com/elementary/gala/pull/1633
* PiP PopupWindow: Support floating point scale factor by @davidmhewitt in https://github.com/elementary/gala/pull/1634
* WorkspaceClone: Handle floating point scaling factors by @davidmhewitt in https://github.com/elementary/gala/pull/1635
* WindowSwitcher: Fix rounded corners by @lenemter in https://github.com/elementary/gala/pull/1638
* WindowIconActor: Support setting floating point scale on placement by @davidmhewitt in https://github.com/elementary/gala/pull/1636
* MultitaskingView: Ensure MonitorClones are visible on other monitors by @davidmhewitt in https://github.com/elementary/gala/pull/1640
* WindowSwitcher: Merge icon and indicator by @lenemter in https://github.com/elementary/gala/pull/1637
* WindowSwitcher: Respect animations key by @lenemter in https://github.com/elementary/gala/pull/1643
* IconGroup: Correctly set highlight opacity on start by @lenemter in https://github.com/elementary/gala/pull/1642
* WindowSwitcher: Update caption width before opening by @lenemter in https://github.com/elementary/gala/pull/1645
* MultitaskingView: Stack docks on top of workspace clones by @davidmhewitt in https://github.com/elementary/gala/pull/1646
* MultitaskingView: Support floating point scale factors by @davidmhewitt in https://github.com/elementary/gala/pull/1647
* MultitaskingView: Allow making screenshots of the screen by @lenemter in https://github.com/elementary/gala/pull/1644
* BackgroundManager: dark dim effect by @danirabbit in https://github.com/elementary/gala/pull/1651
* BackgroundManager: Update Wingpanel color after dimming wallpaper by @lenemter in https://github.com/elementary/gala/pull/1652
* IconGroup: Improve animation by @lenemter in https://github.com/elementary/gala/pull/1653
* Handle cancel action in IconGroup animation by @lenemter in https://github.com/elementary/gala/pull/1654
* Avoid to use Gdk constants when Clutter should be used by @tintou in https://github.com/elementary/gala/pull/1596
* Multitasking view: Respect animations key by @lenemter in https://github.com/elementary/gala/pull/1656
* Window Dim: Use `get_transient_for` by @lenemter in https://github.com/elementary/gala/pull/1659
* Add support for Mutter 44 by @tintou in https://github.com/elementary/gala/pull/1570
* WindowSwitcher: Fix issues on first use and after minimize by @lenemter in https://github.com/elementary/gala/pull/1662
* WindowSwitcherIcon: Correctly set scale factor by @lenemter in https://github.com/elementary/gala/pull/1664
* WindowSwitcher: Improve keyboard navigation by @lenemter in https://github.com/elementary/gala/pull/1663
* WindowSwitcher: Scale shadow by @lenemter in https://github.com/elementary/gala/pull/1665
* Update appdata by @lenemter in https://github.com/elementary/gala/pull/1671
* Fix double icon when crossing icon group by @lenemter in https://github.com/elementary/gala/pull/1670


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/elementary/gala/compare/7.0.2...7.0.3

releases.title: Gala 7.0.2 Released!
releases.body:
## What's Changed
* vapi: Sync with greeter by @bobby285271 in https://github.com/elementary/gala/pull/1565
* Meson: Always add DwellClickTimer and PointerLocator by @lenemter in https://github.com/elementary/gala/pull/1568
* Switch to GHCR containers by @davidmhewitt in https://github.com/elementary/gala/pull/1576
* WindowClone: Don't calculate offset by @lenemter in https://github.com/elementary/gala/pull/1567
* Map notification windows manually while switching workspace by @lenemter in https://github.com/elementary/gala/pull/1577
* Use ClickAction for FramedBackground and close buttons by @lenemter in https://github.com/elementary/gala/pull/1579
* Update gala.appdata.xml.in by @danirabbit in https://github.com/elementary/gala/pull/1581
* Remove texture.png by @lenemter in https://github.com/elementary/gala/pull/1582
* Ignore autorepeat for some keybindings by @lenemter in https://github.com/elementary/gala/pull/1583
* Minimze: Don't restore actor properties by @lenemter in https://github.com/elementary/gala/pull/1585
* Daemon: Workaround broken window menu for some apps by @lenemter in https://github.com/elementary/gala/pull/1574
* WindowOverview and WindowCloneContainer: Cleanup by @lenemter in https://github.com/elementary/gala/pull/1587
* Don't connect to Meta.Display.restacked by @lenemter in https://github.com/elementary/gala/pull/1588
* WindowSwitcher: Select a window on button release by @lenemter in https://github.com/elementary/gala/pull/1590
* Set keyboard layout using `lock_layout_group` by @lenemter in https://github.com/elementary/gala/pull/1589
* WindowTracker: Remove unused connection to notify["focus-window"] by @lenemter in https://github.com/elementary/gala/pull/1592
* WindowOverview: Use `button_release_event` by @lenemter in https://github.com/elementary/gala/pull/1593
* Use separate `notification_group` for notifications by @lenemter in https://github.com/elementary/gala/pull/1598
* Avoid connecting multiple times to `window_created` by @lenemter in https://github.com/elementary/gala/pull/1599
* Add keybindings for switching input source by @lenemter in https://github.com/elementary/gala/pull/1600
* Get MonitorManager from context by @davidmhewitt in https://github.com/elementary/gala/pull/1604
* KeyboardManager: get backend from context by @davidmhewitt in https://github.com/elementary/gala/pull/1605
* WindowClone: optimize ActiveShape by @lenemter in https://github.com/elementary/gala/pull/1603
* Check if window can maximize before performing action by @lenemter in https://github.com/elementary/gala/pull/1613
* PointerLocator: Support floating, monitor specific scale by @davidmhewitt in https://github.com/elementary/gala/pull/1606
* DragDropAction: Check that actor was actually clicked by @lenemter in https://github.com/elementary/gala/pull/1591
* DnD: Don't disable reactivity by @lenemter in https://github.com/elementary/gala/pull/1610
* Add previous/next workspace to available actions by @lenemter in https://github.com/elementary/gala/pull/1614
* Don't manually map notifications while nudge animation is playing by @lenemter in https://github.com/elementary/gala/pull/1611
* PiP: Use constraints by @lenemter in https://github.com/elementary/gala/pull/1608
* Use translation-x for nudge animation by @lenemter in https://github.com/elementary/gala/pull/1612


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/elementary/gala/compare/7.0.1...7.0.2

releases.title: Gala 7.0.1 Released
releases.body:
## What's Changed
* WindowClone: Fix shadows by @lenemter in https://github.com/elementary/gala/pull/1503

* Better super key filter in multitasking view by @lenemter in https://github.com/elementary/gala/pull/1523
* ShadowEffect: inline namespace, copy to PIP by @lenemter in https://github.com/elementary/gala/pull/1520
* WindowClone: Remove custom WindowShadowEffect class by @lenemter in https://github.com/elementary/gala/pull/1531
* WindowClone: Cleanup by @lenemter in https://github.com/elementary/gala/pull/1532
* Extend list of allowed keybindings in multitasking view by @lenemter in https://github.com/elementary/gala/pull/1530
* WorkspaceInsertThumb: Code style fixes by @lenemter in https://github.com/elementary/gala/pull/1533
* Allow zoom keybindings in multitasking view by @lenemter in https://github.com/elementary/gala/pull/1535
* Explicit Clutter and Meta namespaces by @lenemter in https://github.com/elementary/gala/pull/1537
* PIP: Fix log spam by @lenemter in https://github.com/elementary/gala/pull/1521
* Dialogs: Improve force quit string by @davidmhewitt in https://github.com/elementary/gala/pull/1540
* Always use `private` keyword by @lenemter in https://github.com/elementary/gala/pull/1543
* WindowClone: Add click action only in overview mode by @lenemter in https://github.com/elementary/gala/pull/1542
* Fix multitasking view animations by @lenemter in https://github.com/elementary/gala/pull/1529
* Fix PiP positioning offset by @GranPC in https://github.com/elementary/gala/pull/1507
* WindowClone: Fix warnings in window overview by @lenemter in https://github.com/elementary/gala/pull/1549
* WindowOverview: Cleanup by @lenemter in https://github.com/elementary/gala/pull/1548
* PiP: Respect animations key by @lenemter in https://github.com/elementary/gala/pull/1546
* Update appdata with fixed issues by @lenemter in https://github.com/elementary/gala/pull/1556
* build: require mutter 42 by @bobby285271 in https://github.com/elementary/gala/pull/1496
* Fix window maximize and unmaximize animations by @lenemter in https://github.com/elementary/gala/pull/1557
* Remove some deprecations and fix compile warnings by @lenemter in https://github.com/elementary/gala/pull/1544
* WindowClone: Make close button and title respect animations key by @lenemter in https://github.com/elementary/gala/pull/1551
* IconGroup: Make close button respect animations key by @lenemter in https://github.com/elementary/gala/pull/1554
* Cleanup after #1557 by @lenemter in https://github.com/elementary/gala/pull/1559
* DragDropAction: Activate click signal on release by @lenemter in https://github.com/elementary/gala/pull/1560
* WindowIcon: Cleanup by @lenemter in https://github.com/elementary/gala/pull/1561
* Unify move to workspace behaviour by @lenemter in https://github.com/elementary/gala/pull/1562


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/elementary/gala/compare/7.0.0...7.0.1

releases.title: Gala 7.0.0 Released!

**elementary OS 7 Available Now:** Forward thinking and designed for real life

We‚Äôre proud to announce that OS 7.1 is available to download now and shipping soon on several high-quality computers. With OS 7.1, we‚Äôve focused in on:

- Providing personalization options and features that make our operating system more inclusive and accessible
- Protecting your privacy and ensuring apps always operate with your explicit consent
- Addressing your feedback with over 200 bug fixes, design changes, and new features

To get elementary OS 7.1 now, head to [elementary.io] for the download‚Äîor read the [blog post] for the details!

As always, more info about installing (including verifying the SHA256 sum) can be found at [elementary.io/docs/installation]. Be sure to read the [release FAQ].

releases.title: 6.0 Odin
releases.body:
**elementary OS 6 Odin Available Now.** It‚Äôs finally here, and it‚Äôs the biggest update to the platform yet. [Read the announcement](https://blog.elementary.io/elementary-os-6-odin-released/).

---

**If you are installing over a beta or previous RC image** you may encounter an error when using the "Erase Disk and Install" option. If the installer fails, you may need to manually delete the created partitions and try again:

1. Select "Try Installing Again" then "Cancel Installation"
2. Choose "Custom Install (Advanced)"
3. Select "Modify Partitions‚Ä¶" then use GParted to deactivate and delete existing partitions
4. Select :heavy_check_mark: (Apply All Operations) to apply changes, then close GParted
5. Select "Back" to go back to the "Try or Install" view
6. Choose "Erase Disk and Install" to install again

This issue is being tracked at https://github.com/elementary/installer/issues/584

---

Be sure to read the [Release FAQ](https://github.com/elementary/os/wiki/elementary-OS-6-Odin-FAQ)

releases.title: 6.0 Odin RC3
releases.body:
**If you are installing over a beta or previous RC image** you may encounter an error when using the "Erase Disk and Install" option. If the installer fails, you may need to manually delete the created partitions and try again:

1. Select "Try Installing Again" then "Cancel Installation"
2. Choose "Custom Install (Advanced)"
3. Select "Modify Partitions‚Ä¶" then use GParted to deactivate and delete existing partitions
4. Select :heavy_check_mark: (Apply All Operations) to apply changes, then close GParted
5. Select "Back" to go back to the "Try or Install" view
6. Choose "Erase Disk and Install" to install again

This issue is being tracked at https://github.com/elementary/installer/issues/584

### Updates since RC2:

- Fix an issue installing Flatpaks in the user installation (https://github.com/elementary/default-settings/issues/247)
  
   >**Note:** if you've installed a previous image, you will need to run the following in any existing user accounts to manually create the necessary folders. New users are unaffected:
   >
   >```
   >mkdir -p ~/.local/share/flatpak/repo/extensions ~/.local/share/flatpak/repo/objects ~/.local/share/flatpak/repo/refs/heads ~/.local/share/flatpak/repo/refs/mirrors ~/.local/share/flatpak/repo/refs/remotes ~/.local/share/flatpak/repo/state
   >``` 


- Include File Roller contract to re-enable compressing and extracting in apps like Files (https://github.com/elementary/file-roller-contract/issues/3)

   >**Note:** you will need to run `sudo apt install io.elementary.contractor.file-roller` to manually install it on existing RC builds.

releases.title: granite 7.6.0 Released
releases.body:
## What's Changed
* Dialog: Add since annotation to new method by @davidmhewitt in https://github.com/elementary/granite/pull/721
* SwitchModelButton: set accessible label, description, and state by @danirabbit in https://github.com/elementary/granite/pull/723
* ValidatedEntry: set AccessibleState by @danirabbit in https://github.com/elementary/granite/pull/724
* HeaderLabel: set accessible description by @danirabbit in https://github.com/elementary/granite/pull/725
* AbstractSimpleSettingsPage: Correct replacement class by @ryonakano in https://github.com/elementary/granite/pull/726
* meson: Use gnome module to compile schemas by @ryonakano in https://github.com/elementary/granite/pull/727
* SwitchModelButton: wrap label by @danirabbit in https://github.com/elementary/granite/pull/729
* Introduce Granite.Bin for subclassing by @leolost2605 in https://github.com/elementary/granite/pull/730
* Fix dead link (#734) by @salim-b in https://github.com/elementary/granite/pull/735

## New Contributors
* @alainm23 made their first contribution in https://github.com/elementary/granite/pull/736

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/elementary/granite/compare/7.5.0...7.6.0

releases.title: granite 7.5.0 Released
releases.body:
New Features:

  • Toast: add a new dismissed signal that includes the reason for dismissal
  • Add STYLE_CLASS_SUCCESS
  • HeaderLabel: allow secondary text to use markup

Improvements:

  • Make building Demo optional
  • Demo now uses a modern split-pane design
  • DateTime: handle relative datetime when epoch
  • MessageDialog: Set last button as focus widget
  • SwitchModelButton: Remove redundant switch keyboard focusing
  • Load fallback styles for widgets when using Granite.init
  • Updated translations

Deprecations:

  • SettingsPage and SettingsSidebar: these widgets have moved to LibSwitchboard

releases.title: Granite 7.3.0 Released!
releases.body:
## What's Changed
* Fix build with newer Vala by @Exalm in https://github.com/elementary/granite/pull/637
* Switch to GHCR containers by @davidmhewitt in https://github.com/elementary/granite/pull/640
* settings: remove inappropriate ownership annotation by @mcatanzaro in https://github.com/elementary/granite/pull/642
* Add granite styles as a gresource by @danirabbit in https://github.com/elementary/granite/pull/639
* Init: load gresourced styles if present by @danirabbit in https://github.com/elementary/granite/pull/644
* Fix demo desktop file by @meisenzahl in https://github.com/elementary/granite/pull/647
* Settings Urls by @Antolius in https://github.com/elementary/granite/pull/649
* Constants: Add since versions to new URI values by @davidmhewitt in https://github.com/elementary/granite/pull/651
* Styles: add basics by @danirabbit in https://github.com/elementary/granite/pull/646
* Metainfo improvements by @danirabbit in https://github.com/elementary/granite/pull/652
* Update POTFILES by @ryonakano in https://github.com/elementary/granite/pull/654
* README: Point to granite-7 version of valadoc by @ryonakano in https://github.com/elementary/granite/pull/655

## New Contributors
* @Exalm made their first contribution in https://github.com/elementary/granite/pull/637
* @mcatanzaro made their first contribution in https://github.com/elementary/granite/pull/642
* @Antolius made their first contribution in https://github.com/elementary/granite/pull/649

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/elementary/granite/compare/7.2.0...7.3.0

releases.title: granite 7.1.0 Released
releases.body:
New Features:

  • Granite.STYLE_CLASS_RICH_LIST for standard Gtk.ListBox row padding
  • Granite.STYLE_CLASS_FRAME for adding a border to Gtk.LisBox, Gtk.InfoBar, and others
  • Granite.STYLE_CLASS_SIDEBAR for styling application sidebars
  • Granite.STYLE_CLASS_BACKGROUND to use the default background color for a widget
  • Add optional secondary text to Granite.HeaderLabel

Improvements:

  • Allow text in Granite.Toast to wrap
  • SimpleSettingsPage: Wrap titles and allow description text to go under switches
  • Updated translations

releases.title: granite 7.0.0 Released
releases.body:
New Features:

  • Ported to GTK4! üéâÔ∏è
  • Granite.Placeholder: replaces AlertView and Welcome
  • SimpleSettingsPage: Allow markup in description

Removals:

  • Application: use Gtk.Application instead
  • Drawing: Use Gtk.CSS
  • DynamicNotebook: use Adw.TabBar instead
  • Logger: use GLib.log instead
  • ModeButton: Use Gtk.ToggleButton with the "group" property and "linked" style class instead
  • Paths: use GLib.Environment instead
  • Seekbar
  • Services.Settings: use GLib.Settings instead
  • SimpleCommand: use GLib.AppInfo.create_from_commandline instead
  • SourceList: use Gtk.ListBox with the "sidebar" style class instead
  • StorageBar
  • TextStyle: use style class constants instead
  • Several functions in System were replaced by GLib.AppInfo

Improvements:

  • Updated translations

releases.body:
Additions:

Other Changes:

releases.title: granite 6.0.0 Released
releases.body:
Additions:

  • Granite.Dialog replaces Gtk.Dialog for consistent styling
  • Granite.SwitchModelButton for use in Gtk.Popover menus
  • Granite.ValidatedEntry for client-side verification in forms

New Constants:

  • TOOLTIP_SECONDARY_TEXT_MARKUP for smaller second line text in Gtk.Tooltips
  • SMALL_LABEL for smaller Gtk.Labels without Pango
  • STYLE_CLASS_WARMTH and STYLE_CLASS_TEMPERATURE for scales
  • STYLE_CLASS_DEFAULT_DECORATION for slim headerbars
  • TRANSITION_DURATION_OPEN and TRANSITION_DURATION_CLOSE for consistent animations

Removals:

  • Granite.Widgets.AboutDialog. Provide AppStream metadata instead.
  • Granite.Widgets.AppMenu. Use Gtk.MenuButton instead.

Deprecations:

  • Granite.Widgets.Avatar. Use Hdy.Avatar instead

Other Changes:

  • Toasts now reset their timeout when sending a new notification and the timeout is stopped while hovering
  • Backlash, Right Control, and Left Control are now handled by accel_to_string
  • Make tab tooltips of DynamicNotebook settable
  • Timepicker corrrectly fires time_changed when AM and PM buttons are selected
  • Granite.MessageDialog now uses the messagedialog CSS name
  • Visible child name is now properly synced in Granite.SettingsSidebar
  • Status can be set in Granite.AbstractSettingsPage on construct
  • Updated translations

releases.title: granite 5.5.0 Released
releases.body:
New Style Constants:

  • STYLE_CLASS_COLOR_BUTTON
  • STYLE_CLASS_ROUNDED

Deprecations:

  • Several theming utilities. Use Gtk.CssProvider and Gtk.StyleContext instead
  • Granite.Services.SimpleCommand. Use GLib.AppInfo.create_from_commandline instead
  • Old unused utilities like get_button_layout_schema, get_default_close_button_position, and Granite.Services.Paths
  • Old unused widgets like CollapsiblePaned and CompositedWindow

Other Changes:

  • Granite.SourceList now gets Gtk.STYLE_CLASS_SIDEBAR by default
  • Updated translations

releases.title: granite 5.4.0 Released
releases.body:
New features:

  • New Settings class to share Pantheon desktop settings with apps
  • Introduced Settings.prefers_color_scheme to get a user's color scheme preference, i.e. for a dark style

Deprecations:

  • It is now recommended to use GLib.Settings instead of Granite.Services.Settings

releases.title: Granite 5.2.5 Released
releases.body:
Granite 5.2.5 is out!

Changes:
* meson: fix shared library path
* Utils: Add equal keys to accel_to_string
* Provide Badge and Progress support for an Application using same DBus API as libunity
* DynamicNotebook: support `Close Tabs to the Right`
* DynamicNotebook: don‚Äôt re-open closed tabs while rapidly closing tabs
* Updated translations

releases.title: Granite 5.2.4 Released
releases.body:
Granite 5.2.4 is out!

Changes:
* Deprecate IconFactory
* System: deprecate utilies provided by GLib
* Utils: Add more keys to `accel-to-string` (Left and Right Alt, Left and Right Shift)
* MessageDialog: Add the ability to set icon badges
* Revert from custom Wingpanel DateTime settings schema (`io.elementary.desktop.wingpanel.datetime`) to GNOME (`org.gnome.desktop.interface`)
* SimpleSettingsPage: make title and description selectable
* Updated translations

releases.title: Granite 5.2.3 Released
releases.body:
Granite 5.2.3 is out!

Changes:
* Switch from CMake to Meson build system
* DateTime: Strip leading spaces from time formats
* Support Gdk.Key.Return for Enter markup
* MessageDialog: Add show_error_expander method
* Add function `history_is_enabled`
* Fix typos in documentation
* TimePicker: Use more compact boolean comparison syntax
* Updated translations

releases.title: Granite 5.2.2 Released
releases.body:

* Utils: Ignore empty accel strings

releases.title: Granite 5.2.0 Released
releases.body:
Granite 5.2.0 is out!

Changes:
* Added `Granite.STYLE_CLASS_CHECKERBOARD`
* Added Accel utilities:
  * `accel_to_string`, takes something like "<Super>Right" and returns "‚åò + ‚Üí"
  * `markup_accel_tooltip`, takes a description and an accel string array and returns the markup for tooltips
* DateTime: use `io.elementary.desktop.wingpanel.datetime` for settings instead of `org.gnome.desktop.interface`
* Updated translations

releases.title: Granite 5.1.0 Released
releases.body:
Granite 5.1.0 is out!

Changes:
* Add Granite.ModeSwitch
* Deprecate Granite.Application
* SourceList: Don't propagate right click
* DateTime: Add commas in date format
* Improved translations

  • Updated translations

releases.title: code 7.2.0 Released
releases.body:
Improvements:

  • When opening a file in Code from the commandline or another app, a line/char position or selection range may be specified
  • Add a fuzzy-find plugin which finds files in all open projects
  • Save and restore the state of the terminal pane

Minor updates:

  • "Find in Folder" now works for all folders and text files, not only ".vala" files
  • "Follow System Style" is now fully respected
  • The "--new-tab" commandline option now works
  • The symbol pane width is now synchronised and saved
  • Project folders are automatically closed if they are externally renamed, moved or deleted
  • Fixed temporary backup files persisting under some circumstances
  • The Show-Replace action has been improved
  • Updated translations

releases.title: Code 7.1.0 Released!
releases.body:
## What's Changed
* Ensure active project at startup (include non-git folders) by @jeremypw in https://github.com/elementary/code/pull/1254
* Handle saving to unwritable location better to avoid data loss by @jeremypw in https://github.com/elementary/code/pull/1262
* Flatpak: Use 7.1 Sdk, Update Dependencies by @Marukesu in https://github.com/elementary/code/pull/1264
* Make symbol outline aware of follow-system-style setting by @jeremypw in https://github.com/elementary/code/pull/1265
* Show running branch if not master by @jeremypw in https://github.com/elementary/code/pull/1258
* appdata: Minor wording fixes in release notes by @davidmhewitt in https://github.com/elementary/code/pull/1269
* Fix styling when no documents by @jeremypw in https://github.com/elementary/code/pull/1271
* Ensure Replace button (and other search widget) states are mutually consistent  by @jeremypw in https://github.com/elementary/code/pull/1278
* Switch to GHCR containers by @davidmhewitt in https://github.com/elementary/code/pull/1284
* Delay asking for save location if cannot determine write access by @jeremypw in https://github.com/elementary/code/pull/1280
* Additional Search options in menu by @jeremypw in https://github.com/elementary/code/pull/1276
* Implement option to show files with unknown characters as new document by @jeremypw in https://github.com/elementary/code/pull/1283
* Do not change document search results unexpectedly on focus in by @jeremypw in https://github.com/elementary/code/pull/1294
* Add ctrl + pageUp and pageDown for switching tabs by @stan-janssen in https://github.com/elementary/code/pull/1297
* Persist search settings by @jeremypw in https://github.com/elementary/code/pull/1291
* Set search entry icon and styleclass according to results by @jeremypw in https://github.com/elementary/code/pull/1285
* Add release metainfo and update screenshot addresses for 7.1.0 by @jeremypw in https://github.com/elementary/code/pull/1303
* Ask save location with dialog by @jeremypw in https://github.com/elementary/code/pull/1308
* Metainfo: set brand color to Latte 500 by @danirabbit in https://github.com/elementary/code/pull/1313
* Ensure folder items in sidebar always expandable by @jeremypw in https://github.com/elementary/code/pull/1252
* Fix creating duplicates of unwritable files by @jeremypw in https://github.com/elementary/code/pull/1318
* Update metainfo for pull 1252 by @jeremypw in https://github.com/elementary/code/pull/1315
* Fix typo in metainfo by @TomiOhl in https://github.com/elementary/code/pull/1321
* Install man page with meson by @jeremypw in https://github.com/elementary/code/pull/1325
* Reduce terminal noise by @jeremypw in https://github.com/elementary/code/pull/1323
* Remove plugin set option by @jeremypw in https://github.com/elementary/code/pull/1324
* FormatBar: Show column number not buffer offset by @jeremypw in https://github.com/elementary/code/pull/1342
* Handle only relevant settings key changes by @jeremypw in https://github.com/elementary/code/pull/1345
* Use dialog for external changes by @jeremypw in https://github.com/elementary/code/pull/1309
* Sync tab settings by @jeremypw in https://github.com/elementary/code/pull/1347
* Fix searchterm reverts by @jeremypw in https://github.com/elementary/code/pull/1336
* Ensure correct sidebar item is focused, or none, when tab removed by @jeremypw in https://github.com/elementary/code/pull/1320
* Fix logic for clearing search entry by @jeremypw in https://github.com/elementary/code/pull/1359
* Fix spurious external change warnings by @jeremypw in https://github.com/elementary/code/pull/1354
* Meson: modernize by @lenemter in https://github.com/elementary/code/pull/1360
* Release 7.1.0 by @jeremypw in https://github.com/elementary/code/pull/1304

## New Contributors
* @dependabot made their first contribution in https://github.com/elementary/code/pull/1286
* @stan-janssen made their first contribution in https://github.com/elementary/code/pull/1297
* @TomiOhl made their first contribution in https://github.com/elementary/code/pull/1321
* @lenemter made their first contribution in https://github.com/elementary/code/pull/1360

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/elementary/code/compare/7.0.0...7.1.0

releases.title: Code 7.0.0 Released
releases.body:
## What's Changed
* Fix compile warnings by @jeremypw in https://github.com/elementary/code/pull/1056
* add code to keywords by @yuraMovsesyan in https://github.com/elementary/code/pull/1195
* Fix drag and drop of accented text and between tabs by @jeremypw in https://github.com/elementary/code/pull/1194
* Git ignore flatpak build files by @jeremypw in https://github.com/elementary/code/pull/1197
* Ensure tab toggle label is always correct by @jeremypw in https://github.com/elementary/code/pull/1145
* Add follow system style switch by @danirabbit in https://github.com/elementary/code/pull/1202
* Explicitly handle missing cases by @jeremypw in https://github.com/elementary/code/pull/1199
* Remove unused properties by @jeremypw in https://github.com/elementary/code/pull/1205
* Change key to trigger rebuild completion word list by @jeremypw in https://github.com/elementary/code/pull/1149
* Global search selected by @jeremypw in https://github.com/elementary/code/pull/1049
* Move strip trailing whitespace into main code; remove plugin by @jeremypw in https://github.com/elementary/code/pull/1151
* Fix meson warning for run_command by @turbobastii in https://github.com/elementary/code/pull/1207
* Add custom elementary syntax styles by @micahilbery in https://github.com/elementary/code/pull/1076
* Hide non-active documents when project manually chosen by @jeremypw in https://github.com/elementary/code/pull/1114
* Show symbol outline pane on right of document by @jeremypw in https://github.com/elementary/code/pull/1048
* ProjectFolderItem: Fix wrong ngettext syntax by @ryonakano in https://github.com/elementary/code/pull/1212
* Redesign app icon as a tile by @danirabbit in https://github.com/elementary/code/pull/1211
* Put the ProjectChooserButton inside the sidebar by @danirabbit in https://github.com/elementary/code/pull/1217
* HeaderBar: put find actions in menu by @danirabbit in https://github.com/elementary/code/pull/1219
* EditorConfig plugin overrides global settings for indent width and style by @jeremypw in https://github.com/elementary/code/pull/1204
* Make sidebar pane the toplevel container by @danirabbit in https://github.com/elementary/code/pull/1218
* Use elementary styles when following system style by @danirabbit in https://github.com/elementary/code/pull/1222
* Change panel menu items to linkbutton by @danirabbit in https://github.com/elementary/code/pull/1223
* FormatBar: use SwitchModelButton in tab popover by @danirabbit in https://github.com/elementary/code/pull/1227
* Move Terminal to core by @danirabbit in https://github.com/elementary/code/pull/1225
* Headerbar: remove sep before Revert by @danirabbit in https://github.com/elementary/code/pull/1230
* FormatBar: use menubuttons instead of ToggleButtons by @danirabbit in https://github.com/elementary/code/pull/1231
* Sidebar: Remove minimum width by @danirabbit in https://github.com/elementary/code/pull/1233
* GSchema: follow system style by default by @danirabbit in https://github.com/elementary/code/pull/1235
* Only restore documents for first window. by @jeremypw in https://github.com/elementary/code/pull/1239
* Do not add duplicate project by @jeremypw in https://github.com/elementary/code/pull/1238
* Update ci.yml by @danirabbit in https://github.com/elementary/code/pull/1242
* FormatBar: Set sensitivity of affected items, fix binding by @danirabbit in https://github.com/elementary/code/pull/1236
* PluginManager: Remove unused hooks by @danirabbit in https://github.com/elementary/code/pull/1240
* Make Control-Scroll zooming controllable by @jeremypw in https://github.com/elementary/code/pull/1245
* Metainfo improvements by @danirabbit in https://github.com/elementary/code/pull/1241
* Headerbar: code style, small fixes by @danirabbit in https://github.com/elementary/code/pull/1234
* Application: use built-in GLib functions in Activate by @danirabbit in https://github.com/elementary/code/pull/1243
* Inactivate find actions when no current doc by @jeremypw in https://github.com/elementary/code/pull/1251
* Fix startup warnings by @jeremypw in https://github.com/elementary/code/pull/1250
* Styles: misc refinements by @danirabbit in https://github.com/elementary/code/pull/1226

## New Contributors
* @yuraMovsesyan made their first contribution in https://github.com/elementary/code/pull/1195
* @turbobastii made their first contribution in https://github.com/elementary/code/pull/1207
* @micahilbery made their first contribution in https://github.com/elementary/code/pull/1076

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/elementary/code/compare/6.2.0...7.0.0

releases.title: code 6.2.0 Released
releases.body:
Improvements:

  • The current document filename is now shown as the window title in multitasking view
  • Hidden folders are now shown in the project sidebar
  • The currently selected result and the number of results is displayed while searching
  • The search bar now has a regular expression mode

Fixes:

  • It is now possible to change Git branch with untracked files present in a project
  • Crashes are prevented while searching in large projects
  • The correct document is now focused after opening Code from an external program
  • Line duplication is now actioned correctly if there is no selection present
  • Code no longer crashes when asked to open an unknown URI format

Minor updates:

  • Updated translations

releases.title: code 6.1.0 Released
releases.body:
Improvements:

  • Projects with the same name now include their parent folder name as well
  • When scrolling to search results, overshoot slightly for better visibility
  • Use the FileChooser portal instead of the one from GTK
  • Center the global search dialog over the main Code window

Fixes:

  • Fix visibility of Terminal button on Welcome page
  • Fix some keyboard shortcuts affecting unfocused Document instead of focused Terminal
  • Close Terminal if shell exited and create new Terminal if re-opened with no shell

Minor updates:

  • "Visible whitespace" combobox is now a switch
  • Updated translations

releases.title: Code 6.0.1 Released
releases.body:
Fixes:

  • Fix crash when creating new window from tab drop
  • Ensure files created from the sidebar are automatically opened

Improvements:

  • Hide project chooser button when hiding sidebar

Minor updates:

  • Ensure all copy is translatable
  • Updated translations

releases.title: code 6.0.0 Released
releases.body:
New features:

  • New Markdown plugin for WYSIWYG-like editing.
  • Switch Git branches or create new ones in project folder context menus
  • Show Git diff status in source view gutters
  • Full text search within project folder.
  • Save and restore cursor position between sessions
  • Close files from a project when that project is closed
  • Show full file path in tab tooltips
  • Clear lines with Ctrl + K

Minor updates:

  • Allow Spell Checker extension in Markdown files
  • Improve multi-line duplication
  • Remember whether the sidebar is open
  • Set window title to the focused file
  • Add keyboard shortcuts for next and previous documents
  • Show full document path in tab tooltip
  • Update Pastebin plugin
  • Corrently indent last line when using the preserve whitespace plugin
  • Keep syntax highlighting when duplicating a file
  • Expand a collapsed folder if you attempt to open it twice
  • Fix an issue where searches are lost when Code loses focus
  • Start Vim plugin in command mode
  • Fix and add new Vim commands
  • Show project folders with a hidden root folder
  • Allow launching with pkexec and disallow launching with sudo
  • Remove split view
  • Remove browser preview
  • Updated translations

releases.title: code 3.4.1 Released
releases.body:
Fixes:

  • Fix empty sidebar layout, ensuring folders can always be added

Minor updates:

  • Scroll past the end of a file
  • More efficiently save and restore window position
  • Updated translations

releases.title: code 3.4.0 Released
releases.body:
code 3.4.0 is out!

New features:

  • Include Git status in file tooltips
  • Option for explicit case-sensitive Find

Other updates:

  • Correctly show Toggle Comment menu item when no text is selected
  • Fixed font switch alignment
  • Updated translations

releases.title: code 3.3.0 Released
releases.body:
code 3.3.0 is out!

New features:

  • New "Close Other Folders" menu item to help clean up your sidebar
  • Save and restore cyclic search setting

Other updates:

  • Add keyboard shortcuts to menu items
  • Make sidebar folder items not selectable
  • Center new windows
  • Updated translations

releases.title: code 3.2.0 Released
releases.body:
code 3.2.0 is out!

New features:

  • Visually deprioritize .gitignored files in project sidebar
  • Smart cut/copy lines with no active selection
  • Add a confirmation dialog to the "Restore" action
  • Add "Open In" menu to the top-level folder in the folder manager
  • Don't show temporary files in the folder manager
  • Add brackets completion and auto-indent by default
  • Zoom terminal plugin with keyboard
  • Honor global privacy setting when saving and restoring

Other updates:

  • Simplify "Draw spaces" preference
  • Fix the keyboard shortcut for going backwards in search results
  • Fix opening files from relative paths in Terminal
  • Fix null file dialog when opening a new window via the dock
  • Add "=" as a zoom key
  • Change search entry icon when results aren't found
  • Enter name of new file before creating it
  • Updated translations

releases.body:
## What's Changed
* ConnectServerDialog: Gtk4 prep by @danirabbit in https://github.com/elementary/files/pull/2226
* FileConflictDialog: Gtk4 prep by @danirabbit in https://github.com/elementary/files/pull/2228
* RenamerListBox: Gtk4 prep by @danirabbit in https://github.com/elementary/files/pull/2230
* ButtonWithMenu: cleanup, Gtk4 prep by @danirabbit in https://github.com/elementary/files/pull/2231
* Widgets/Label move to AppUtils by @danirabbit in https://github.com/elementary/files/pull/2232
* ProgerssUIHandler: gtk4 prep by @danirabbit in https://github.com/elementary/files/pull/2234
* RenamerDialog: cleanup and Gtk4 prep by @danirabbit in https://github.com/elementary/files/pull/2237

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/elementary/files/compare/6.4.0...6.4.1

releases.title: Files 6.4.0 Released!
releases.body:
## What's Changed
* AbstractPropertiesDialog: replace StorageBar with Gtk.LevelBar by @danirabbit in https://github.com/elementary/files/pull/2171
* Implement auto-renaming of multiple selected files by @jeremypw in https://github.com/elementary/files/pull/1999
* Update POTFILES by @ryonakano in https://github.com/elementary/files/pull/2178
* Silence critical warning on startup by @jeremypw in https://github.com/elementary/files/pull/2182
* Improve speed of loading and display of large  folders by @jeremypw in https://github.com/elementary/files/pull/2184
* BulkRename: Differentiate identical strings for translating by @lenemter in https://github.com/elementary/files/pull/2186
* Get current date properly by @jeremypw in https://github.com/elementary/files/pull/2185
* Fix duplicate files and other recent regressions by @jeremypw in https://github.com/elementary/files/pull/2191
* Require newer meson and fix deprecations by @lenemter in https://github.com/elementary/files/pull/2196
* Modernize Metainfo by @danirabbit in https://github.com/elementary/files/pull/2198
* Bulk Rename: Use ModeButton for basename options by @jeremypw in https://github.com/elementary/files/pull/2201
* Use active language for basename options by @jeremypw in https://github.com/elementary/files/pull/2202
* Do not show externally created hidden files with no file info by @jeremypw in https://github.com/elementary/files/pull/2200
* Extend File.compare_by_size to use folder item count where appropriate by @jeremypw in https://github.com/elementary/files/pull/1978
* Avoid appearance of short-lived temporary files in view by @jeremypw in https://github.com/elementary/files/pull/2221
* Prepare metainfo for next release by @jeremypw in https://github.com/elementary/files/pull/2217
* Release 6.4.0 by @jeremypw in https://github.com/elementary/files/pull/2222

## New Contributors
* @lenemter made their first contribution in https://github.com/elementary/files/pull/2186

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/elementary/files/compare/6.3.1...6.4.0

releases.title: Files 6.2.0 Released
releases.body:
Improvements:
- Provide option to select folders with single click and activate with double click
- Only show the properties overlay when files are selected, not when hovered

Fixes:
- Fix unexpected file activation after navigation with double-click
- Fix dimmed window after use of filechooser portal
- Fix possible crash when rapidly changing view modes
- Fix startup when restored remote location is no longer connected
- Ensure infobar shows in connection server dialog when connection attempt fails
- Ensure correct icon for bookmark to a file that is not a folder
- Fix possible crash when removing a bookmark

Minor updates:
- Updated translations

releases.title: files 6.1.3 Released
releases.body:
Fixes:

  • Renaming with the same name no longer shows an error dialog
  • Ctrl + A when renaming now selects all the text in the entry
  • Selecting multiple items with Shift + Arrow keys now works properly
  • The appearance of the cursor now matches the action
  • The Trash sidebar item can no longer be removed
  • Network sidebar plugins such as NextCloud are now added correctly
  • Duplication of subfolders in ListView under some circumstances is fixed
  • Bookmarks are now highlighted when a file they can accept is dragged onto them
  • Folders not being restored properly under some circumstances is fixed
  • Show confirmation dialog in file chooser before overwriting an existing file
  • Ctrl + V now always pastes into background folder
  • Shift + Ctrl + V now pastes into selected folder if there is one

Minor updates:

  • Updated translations

releases.title: files 6.0.0 Released
releases.body:
Fixes:

  • Fix connecting to AFP servers so that passwords are remembered
  • Fix MTP mounts

Improvements:

  • Launch files with double click instead of single click
  • Provide a File Chooser portal for Flatpak apps
  • Brand new animated Sidebar
  • Dark style support
  • Mint and Bubblegum color tags
  • Do not restore locations that have become inaccessible
  • Clicking between thumbnail and text now activates/selects in Icon view
  • AFC protocol support
  • Add a smaller minimum icon size in list view

  • Performance improvements
  • Stability improvements

Other updates:

  • Rename "Devices" to "Storage"
  • Updated translations

releases.title: files 4.5.0 Released
releases.body:
Improvements:

  • Bookmark menu option for network mounts in sidebar
  • Show folder item count in List View
  • Now shows thumbnails on locally mounted MTP and PTP devices as well as on network locations by default
  • Properties window: Allow the filename to be copied when it cannot be edited
  • Improved tooltip formatting for devices in the sidebar

Fixes:

  • Fix crash when pressing Enter and another key at the same time
  • Fix pathbar handling of "~" and ".." in path
  • Filechooser pathbar no longer crashes when invoked from a Flatpak
  • Do not show git status for repositories on FUSE filesystems to prevent possible blocking

Other updates:

  • "Personal" is now "Bookmarks"
  • Updated translations

releases.title: Session Settings 8.0.0 Release!
releases.body:
## What's Changed
* CI: remove Nix by @bobby285271 in https://github.com/elementary/session-settings/pull/61
* Add systemd support by @davidmhewitt in https://github.com/elementary/session-settings/pull/55
* build: add systemduserunitdir option by @bobby285271 in https://github.com/elementary/session-settings/pull/62
* systemd: also pull in GSD targets by @bobby285271 in https://github.com/elementary/session-settings/pull/63
* Switch to GHCR containers by @davidmhewitt in https://github.com/elementary/session-settings/pull/65
* Add optional Wayland session by @danirabbit in https://github.com/elementary/session-settings/pull/66
* Reflect new systemd target name by @tintou in https://github.com/elementary/session-settings/pull/67
* Remove gala-daemon by @leolost2605 in https://github.com/elementary/session-settings/pull/71
* Require gnome-settings-daemon 3.36.0 and deduplicate gsd_components by @bobby285271 in https://github.com/elementary/session-settings/pull/72
* Use systemd managed gnome-session by @bobby285271 in https://github.com/elementary/session-settings/pull/73
* systemd: Install session.conf also to gnome-session@pantheon-wayland.target.d by @leolost2605 in https://github.com/elementary/session-settings/pull/75
* Rename sessions by @danirabbit in https://github.com/elementary/session-settings/pull/77
* Add localization by @danirabbit in https://github.com/elementary/session-settings/pull/79

## New Contributors
* @bobby285271 made their first contribution in https://github.com/elementary/session-settings/pull/61
* @tintou made their first contribution in https://github.com/elementary/session-settings/pull/67
* @leolost2605 made their first contribution in https://github.com/elementary/session-settings/pull/71

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/elementary/session-settings/compare/6.0.0...8.0.0

releases.title: Greeter 7.0.0 Released!
releases.body:
## What's Changed
* actions/checkout@v3 by @meisenzahl in https://github.com/elementary/greeter/pull/631
* ci: Switch to mutter-10 by @tintou in https://github.com/elementary/greeter/pull/638
* Compositor: Remove unused functions by @lenemter in https://github.com/elementary/greeter/pull/635
* AccessDialog: Copy changes from Gala by @lenemter in https://github.com/elementary/greeter/pull/636
* WindowManager: confirm_display_change() Fixes by @lenemter in https://github.com/elementary/greeter/pull/637
* build: require mutter 42 by @tintou in https://github.com/elementary/greeter/pull/639
* Switch to GHCR containers by @davidmhewitt in https://github.com/elementary/greeter/pull/642
* Copy KeyboardManager from Gala by @lenemter in https://github.com/elementary/greeter/pull/644
* KeyboardManager: Set keyboard layout on startup by @lenemter in https://github.com/elementary/greeter/pull/645
* Add support for Mutter 44 by @bobby285271 in https://github.com/elementary/greeter/pull/643
* Fix meson warnings by @lenemter in https://github.com/elementary/greeter/pull/649
* meson: Install lightdm config by @meisenzahl in https://github.com/elementary/greeter/pull/651
* CI: Use any available mutter version by @lenemter in https://github.com/elementary/greeter/pull/657
* Compositor: Mask corners by @lenemter in https://github.com/elementary/greeter/pull/661
* Metainfo Improvements by @danirabbit in https://github.com/elementary/greeter/pull/663
* Use user's mouse and touchpad settings by @lenemter in https://github.com/elementary/greeter/pull/655
* Use user's xkb options by @lenemter in https://github.com/elementary/greeter/pull/658
* Update metainfo by @lenemter in https://github.com/elementary/greeter/pull/666
* Improve handling of users' accent color by @lenemter in https://github.com/elementary/greeter/pull/667
* Fix screenreader shortcut by @lenemter in https://github.com/elementary/greeter/pull/668
* Save screenreader state between sessions by @lenemter in https://github.com/elementary/greeter/pull/669
* Use user's interface settings by @lenemter in https://github.com/elementary/greeter/pull/670
* Use user's night light settings by @lenemter in https://github.com/elementary/greeter/pull/662
* Compositor: Implement PointerLocator by @lenemter in https://github.com/elementary/greeter/pull/674
* ManualCard: Small Gtk4 prep by @lenemter in https://github.com/elementary/greeter/pull/676
* UserCard: Small Gtk4 prep by @lenemter in https://github.com/elementary/greeter/pull/675
* Use users' fonts by @lenemter in https://github.com/elementary/greeter/pull/677
* UserCard: Handle click event using `Gtk.GestureMultiPress` by @lenemter in https://github.com/elementary/greeter/pull/680
* Don't reset user settings when entering wrong credentials by @lenemter in https://github.com/elementary/greeter/pull/681
* Respect solid color wallpaper by @lenemter in https://github.com/elementary/greeter/pull/672

## New Contributors
* @lenemter made their first contribution in https://github.com/elementary/greeter/pull/635

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/elementary/greeter/compare/6.1.1...7.0.0

releases.title: Greeter 3.2.0 Released
releases.body:
pantheon-greeter 3.2.0 is out!

This release is mostly code cleanup.

## What's Changed

* Fix: If card0 is not available try card1
* added: additional monitors and status info for cpu freq and vram usage by @ProPuke in https://github.com/stsdc/monitor/pull/373
* Update Japanese translation by @ryonakano in https://github.com/stsdc/monitor/pull/374
* Update Russian translation by @lenemter in https://github.com/stsdc/monitor/pull/375
* [TRANS] Updated french translations by @RedNeath in https://github.com/stsdc/monitor/pull/376

## New Contributors
* @ProPuke made their first contribution in https://github.com/stsdc/monitor/pull/373
* @lenemter made their first contribution in https://github.com/stsdc/monitor/pull/375
* @RedNeath made their first contribution in https://github.com/stsdc/monitor/pull/376

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/stsdc/monitor/compare/0.17.1...0.17.2

* Fix VRAM percentage

Special thanks to @davidak

* Add GPU temperature to the Indicator
  * Fix assigning right icon and name to a process (special thanks to @ppvan and @nahuelwexd)
  * Allow to filter processes by command
  * Fix for icons appear slightly smaller in detailed process view
* Technical release to fix Launchpad package building
* Fix segfault when user can't be retrieved for process

* Show processes from all users
  * Refresh icons
  * Fix some typos (@kianmeng)
- Fix error when trying to get percentage from non-detected GPU

* Show containers stats (inspired by [Whaler](https://github.com/sdv43/whaler))
  * Add GPU usage in Indicator
  * Remove transparency from CPU stacked chart
  * Add docker icon
  * Update Ukrainian translation
  * Update Portuguese translation @hugok79 
  * Update Japanese translation @ryonakano 
  * Update Russian translation @camellan 
  * Fix segfaults caused by issue in assigning colors in charts @vjr 
  * Add an option to choose refresh rate
  * Use harmonic mean to calculate frequency values @adm313

* Sort list of opened files by process for easier reading
  * Improve command parsing: support python commands
  * Display bash icon for bash processes
  * improve wording for disabling smooth lines option
  * Fix incorrect spacing when confirming to kill process
  * Hide search bar when avtive view is not a ProcessView
